attributes.action: MORE HELP WITH UNMEPLOYEMENT AND GETTING PEOPLE TO INVEST IN YOUNG PEOPLE WHO WANT TO WORK AND HAVE A CHANCE IN LIFE.
attributes.additional_details:
WOULD LOVE TO HAVE A FULL TIME JOB AND BE GIVEN A CHANCE LIKE MOST YOUNG PEOPLE FEEL UPSET AND WORTHLESS EVERYDAY BECAUSE HAVE DONE RUBBISH JOBS COLLEGE AND EVERY THING THE GOVERNMENT HAVE SENT ME ON BUT STILL CANT GET A BREAK.

FOR ALL MY FRIEDS OUTTHERE THAT JUST NEED A JOB AND A BREAK

CATHERINE

GOOD LUCK
